OOC: Hey! Good to see ya again.

::Epyon::

He landed in front of the CF. He noticed that Alliance memberes were
there, but Hot Rod was with them. He went to the controle room for his
meeting with Iron Raptor. He needed to get the two memberes of his crew
back. He sat down.
"Hello," he said to Iron Raptor.

::Hot Rod::

"Well we could probably use some extra hands in repairing the ship. Your
welcome to help."
He began working on small sections where the CF had been damaged.

::DrillBit::

He arrived where DarkFate  was after locking onto signature.
He then transformed back to bot mode.
"DarkFate, what we do now? And where is Killfest?"

::Dollon::

He flew his shuttle into docking at the Black Fortress. It was too bad
that the deal with the traders failed. They needed those weapons.
He woundered where everyone was. He hadn't seen Killfest, DarkFate, or
Commander DrillBit since the attack on Hell Beasts base was launched. He
opened a comm.
"Dark Mouse? Golden Eye? You two at base?"

::Demolition::

He stood quietly as Havoc and Hot Rod talked.
